channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [GRA9][Virtual Private Servers] - Upgrade infrastructure
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 07:00 - 07:30 UTC

Feb 16, 08:55 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/03/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2022 07:30 UTC
Service impact : The impacted servers cannot be manipulated (reboot, reinstallation...) during this operation.
Servers continue to operate normally during maintenance and new orders can be delivered.
Service improvement : Upgrade of the Virtual Private Servers infrastructure (RabbitMQ servers)

item.title: [RBX4][Dedicated servers] 50D and 51D
item.description:
Feb 16, 15:34 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/02/2022 19:41 UTC
End Time : 16/02/2022 14:47 UTC
Service impacted : Some servers were unreachable
Root cause : Due to problems related to the water leak, , our teams had to take measures to cut off the servers to avoid consequences that could occur related to the termic.

Feb 16, 13:52 UTC
Update - There are currently 3 servers down.

Feb 16, 11:57 UTC
Update - There are currently 10 servers down.

Feb 16, 11:18 UTC
Update - There are currently 17 servers down.
Our teams are still working on solving the problem.

Feb 16, 10:08 UTC
Update - There are currently 21 servers down.

Feb 16, 09:40 UTC
Update - There are still 23 servers impacted at the moment.

Feb 16, 09:09 UTC
Update - There are still 26 servers impacted at the moment.

Feb 16, 08:27 UTC
Update - There are still 42 servers impacted at the moment.

Feb 16, 07:29 UTC
Update - There are currently 49 servers down.

Feb 16, 06:21 UTC
Update - There are currently 60 servers down.

Feb 16, 05:37 UTC
Update - There are currently 64 servers down.

Feb 16, 04:03 UTC
Update - There are currently 74 servers down.

Feb 16, 02:43 UTC
Update - There are currently 95 servers down.

Feb 16, 00:44 UTC
Update - There are currently 113 servers down.

Feb 16, 00:11 UTC
Update - There are still 140 servers impacted at the moment, racks 51D07, 51D11 and 51D12 are available again.

Feb 15, 22:41 UTC
Update - Our teams have carried out a repair.
The affected servers are being checked before being put back into service.

We will keep you informed when we start to power up the servers again.

Feb 15, 21:12 UTC
Update - Update:The repair is in actually in progress. Our technicians are currently working on it.
Next update: 15/02/2022 22h05 UTC

Feb 15, 21:03 UTC
Update - Update:10 racks are impacted.

Feb 15, 21:01 UTC
Update - Update:221 servers are unreachable.

Feb 15, 20:52 UTC
Update - Update:9 racks are impacted.

Feb 15, 20:42 UTC
Update - Update:6 racks are impacted.

Feb 15, 20:37 UTC
Update - Update:Only dedicated servers are impacted actually.

Feb 15, 20:07 UTC
Identified - Start time : 15/02/2022 19:41 UTC
Service impact : 2 rooms are impacted
